story.iWant: to adjust game options like sound effects

tasks.task: Implement modal or dialog for options menu. (AC: 1)
Develop UI controls for various settings (e.g., sound volume slider, toggle for sound effects). (AC: 1)
Implement logic to apply changes made in the options menu to the game. (AC: 1)
Ensure options menu is accessible from anywhere in the game. (AC: 1)

acceptanceCriteria.criterion: Given I am in the game, when I select the "Options" menu, then a screen or dialog appears with options to adjust settings (e.g., sound volume).
And changing these settings affects the game accordingly.
